Message.MessageText: The package data is incomplete. The data required to support actions could not be retrieved. (Unsupported feature)

Parameters.Parameter: Actions for composite objects are not supported.

Result.label: Text Topics Summary

Message.MessageText: The package data is incomplete. The data required to support actions could not be retrieved. (Unsupported feature)

Parameters.Parameter: Actions for composite objects are not supported.

Result.Data:
"The text topics object displays a set of words from a document collection, in this case quote. The size of each term in the cloud indicates its importance. Text topics analyzes each value in the document collection as text containing multiple words. Text topics identifies words used throughout the document collection as relevant terms (omitting common words such as ""the""). It defines terms that appear together often in documents as topics.
For the selected topic ""+threshold, +level, +define, materiality"", the word cloud displays the terms with the greatest topic weights. The topic weight for a term measures how strongly it indicates that a document containing the term will be relevant to the topic. For example, ""threshold"" gives the best indication that a document is relevant to the ""+threshold, +level, +define, materiality"" topic."

Result.label: Topics
Result.StringTable: "+analysis, +scenario, +test, stress" "+increase, +cost, +revenue, +impact" "+storm, +extreme event, +categorize, extreme" "+threshold, +level, +define, materiality" "chronic, +climate risk hazard, +location, geographical location" "coastal, +methodology cover, +hazard type, +cover" "data, third-party, third-party data, +provider" "la, postale, banque, +total exposure" "moody, rise, sea, level rise" "precipitation, +wildfire, +wave, heat" "rainfall, variability, heat, wind" "scarcity, biodiversity loss, biodiversity, resource scarcity"

P.Span: This analysis is based on the
disclosure templates collected for disclosure purposes.
(Banking book - Climate change physical risk: Exposures subject to physical risk).
Took place in the period July-August 2025.
Methodology in place to assess if an exposure is sensitive to impact from chronic climate change events or acute climate change events.
The list of banks included in the analysis by country.
